verses.text: \w The|strong="H1732"\w* \w parables|strong="H4912"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
\w To|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*:

\w To|strong="H4941"\w* \w understand|strong="H7919"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* words \w of|strong="H4941"\w* prudence: \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H4941"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* \w of|strong="H4941"\w* doctrine, \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w equity|strong="H4339"\w*:

\w To|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* subtilty \w to|strong="H5414"\w* little ones, \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w and|strong="H5288"\w* understanding.

\w A|strong="H8085"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w* \w shall|strong="H7069"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w shall|strong="H7069"\w* \w be|strong="H3254"\w* \w wiser|strong="H2450"\w*: \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3254"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* understandeth, \w shall|strong="H7069"\w* possess governments.

He \w shall|strong="H1697"\w* \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w a|strong="H1697"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* interpretation, \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w their|strong="H0995"\w* mysterious \w sayings|strong="H2420"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*. \w Fools|strong="H0191"\w* \w despise|strong="H0936"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*.

\w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5203"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*:

\w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* may \w be|strong="H3588"\w* added \w to|strong="H7218"\w* thy \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* chain \w of|strong="H7218"\w* gold \w to|strong="H7218"\w* thy \w neck|strong="H1621"\w*.

\w My|strong="H0518"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* entice thee, \w consent|strong="H0014"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w to|strong="H0014"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: Come \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w us|strong="H0559"\w*, let \w us|strong="H0559"\w* \w lie|strong="H0693"\w* \w in|strong="H0693"\w* \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, let \w us|strong="H0559"\w* \w hide|strong="H6845"\w* snares \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w without|strong="H2600"\w* \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*:

\w Let|strong="H3381"\w* \w us|strong="H3381"\w* \w swallow|strong="H1104"\w* \w him|strong="H3381"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* \w like|strong="H3381"\w* hell, \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w whole|strong="H8549"\w* \w as|strong="H3381"\w* \w one|strong="H2416"\w* that goeth \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3381"\w* \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*.

\w We|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w substance|strong="H1952"\w*, \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w spoils|strong="H7998"\w*.

\w Cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* thy \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* us, \w let|strong="H1961"\w* us \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w purse|strong="H3599"\w*.

\w My|strong="H0854"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w walk|strong="H1870"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thou \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w them|strong="H0854"\w*, \w restrain|strong="H4513"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H1870"\w* \w paths|strong="H5410"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H7323"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w make|strong="H4116"\w* \w haste|strong="H4116"\w* \w to|strong="H7323"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w net|strong="H7568"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w spread|strong="H2219"\w* \w in|strong="H5869"\w* \w vain|strong="H2600"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w them|strong="H2219"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1818"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w* \w lie|strong="H0693"\w* \w in|strong="H0693"\w* \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w own|strong="H6845"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* practise deceits against \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w own|strong="H6845"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wage \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* covetous \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w possessors|strong="H1167"\w*.

\w Wisdom|strong="H2454"\w* preacheth \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*, she uttereth \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*:

\w At|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* multitudes \w she|strong="H7121"\w* crieth out, \w in|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* uttereth \w her|strong="H7121"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w O|strong="H4970"\w* children, \w how|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w love|strong="H0157"\w* childishness, \w and|strong="H0157"\w* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* \w covet|strong="H2530"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w things|strong="H2530"\w* which \w are|strong="H1992"\w* hurtful \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H0157"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* unwise \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*?

\w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* ye \w at|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w*: \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w utter|strong="H5042"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* shew \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w I|strong="H3282"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3282"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w*: \w I|strong="H3282"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w my|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* regarded.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* despised \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, \w and|strong="H6098"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* neglected \w my|strong="H3605"\w* reprehensions.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* \w destruction|strong="H0343"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w mock|strong="H3932"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H1571"\w* \w shall|strong="H1571"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w* which \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w feared|strong="H6343"\w*.

\w When|strong="H0935"\w* sudden \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w destruction|strong="H0343"\w*, \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* tempest, shall be \w at|strong="H5921"\w* hand: \w when|strong="H0935"\w* tribulation \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*:

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H7121"\w* \w I|strong="H0227"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hear: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* rise \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* morning \w and|strong="H7121"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*:

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* instruction \w and|strong="H3068"\w* received \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w Nor|strong="H3808"\w* consented \w to|strong="H0014"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w despised|strong="H5006"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H4156"\w* \w they|strong="H1870"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* own \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* own \w devices|strong="H4156"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w turning|strong="H4878"\w* away \w of|strong="H7962"\w* little \w ones|strong="H3684"\w* shall \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w them|strong="H2026"\w*, \w and|strong="H0006"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w prosperity|strong="H7962"\w* \w of|strong="H7962"\w* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* shall \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w them|strong="H2026"\w*.

\w But|strong="H8085"\w* he \w that|strong="H8085"\w* shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* me, shall \w rest|strong="H7931"\w* without \w terror|strong="H6343"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* shall enjoy abundance, without \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w of|strong="H8085"\w* evils.
